p: Consistent with H4c, house distance estimates were consistently and strongly negative, indicating that medicinal plant knowledge is more likely to be taught and learned by people who live close to each other. Consistent with H4d, spouse estimates were consistently and strongly positive, indicating that medicinal plant knowledge is more likely to be taught and learned by spouses (99% chance). Consistent with H4e, same-village estimates were consistently and strongly positive, indicating that medicinal plant knowledge is more likely to be taught and learned by residents of the same village (95% chance).
